experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Cocotechoes Solution Pvt. Ltd.
workDescription: Led a highly skilled development team in the creation of a sophisticated real estate application for one of the largest companies in Australia.
Collaborated closely with stakeholders to gather and refine project requirements, ensuring alignment with business goals.
Developed comprehensive architecture diagrams to provide a clear visual representation of the project's structure and design.
Implemented Atomic Design Patterns to establish a modular and scalable architecture, enhancing maintainability and code reusability.
Successfully built the frontend application from scratch using React Native, demonstrating expertise in cross-platform mobile application development.
Conducted code reviews, ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices, contributing to the overall quality of the codebase.
Provided technical leadership and guidance to the development team, fostering collaboration and knowledge sharing.

experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.subtitle: Magic ed-tech
workDescription: Led a multidisciplinary team of software developers and interns, overseeing the full software development lifecycle.
Conducted comprehensive training sessions to establish and maintain consistent coding practices, project standards, and workflows across the department.
Mentored interns, providing individualized support and guidance to accelerate their growth into proficient software developers.
Worked on multiple projects based on React JS and React Native, contributing to the successful delivery of high-quality software solutions.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including product managers and designers, to translate business requirements into technical specifications.
Provided technical expertise and leadership in resolving complex technical challenges, ensuring the timely delivery of projects.
Contributed to the continuous improvement of development processes, tools, and methodologies, fostering a culture of innovation and excellence.

experiences.title: Software Consultant
experiences.subtitle: Self Employed
workDescription: Worked independently with a diverse set of technologies, including PHP, Node JS, Native Android, Angular, Ionic, React Native, and React JS.
Collaborated closely with clients to understand project requirements and goals, ensuring alignment with business objectives.
Designed and implemented custom software solutions, providing clients with tailored and scalable applications to meet their specific needs.
Conducted in-depth analyses of client-server architectures, optimizing performance and security to enhance overall system reliability.
Provided technical consultancy services, offering recommendations and solutions to clients for improving software systems and processes.
Maintained up-to-date knowledge of industry trends, emerging technologies, and best practices, ensuring the delivery of cutting-edge solutions.
Established and maintained strong client relationships, earning a reputation for delivering high-quality work and meeting project deadlines.
